title: Frontend Developer (React)
description: Work on building responsive and dynamic user interfaces using React. Collaborate with designers and backend developers to deliver high-quality web applications.
company_description: TechNova je mlada softverska kompanija osnovana 2018. godine, fokusirana na izradu modernih web i mobilnih aplikacija za klijente širom svijeta. Poznati su po inovacijama u UI/UX dizajnu i agilnom pristupu razvoju.

title: Backend Developer (FastAPI + MySQL)
description: Develop scalable APIs using FastAPI and manage relational databases with MySQL. Focus on performance optimization and integration with front-end systems.
company_description: DataWorks je njemačka IT kompanija sa sjedištem u Berlinu, osnovana 2010. godine. Specijalizovana je za data engineering i analitiku, pružajući rješenja za velike evropske korporacije.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Maintain and improve CI/CD pipelines, manage cloud infrastructure, and ensure system reliability. Strong knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, and monitoring tools required.
company_description: CloudForge je holandska kompanija koja od 2015. nudi cloud rješenja za startupe i enterprise klijente. Njihove usluge uključuju DevOps outsourcing, automatizaciju i optimizaciju infrastrukture.

title: Mobile Developer (Flutter)
description: Design and develop cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter. Work closely with product teams to implement new features and maintain app stability.
company_description: Appify je globalni startup koji razvija mobilne aplikacije za e-commerce, fintech i health-tech industrije. Osnovan je 2020. i već ima preko 1 milion korisnika njihovih aplikacija.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Create user-centered designs, conduct usability testing, and deliver wireframes and prototypes. Collaborate with developers to ensure design accuracy.
company_description: DesignHub je londonska dizajnerska agencija osnovana 2012. godine. Fokusirani su na digitalni dizajn, branding i UX istraživanja za poznate evropske i američke brendove.

title: Full Stack Developer (MERN)
description: Work on full stack applications using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js. Implement features across front and back end while ensuring scalability.
company_description: WebCraft je poljska kompanija osnovana 2016. godine, fokusirana na razvoj web aplikacija i e-commerce rješenja koristeći moderne JavaScript tehnologije.

title: AI Engineer (NLP)
description: Build and optimize natural language processing models. Work with large datasets and collaborate with linguists to improve accuracy and usability.
company_description: LinguaTech je francuski AI startup osnovan 2017. godine, specijalizovan za NLP rješenja, mašinsko prevođenje i semantičku analizu teksta.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze datasets, prepare dashboards, and provide insights to support business decisions. Familiarity with SQL and BI tools preferred.
company_description: Insightly je konsultantska firma osnovana u Londonu 2014. godine, fokusirana na business intelligence, analitiku podataka i BI rješenja za mala i srednja preduzeća.

title: Security Engineer
description: Identify vulnerabilities, perform penetration testing, and implement security best practices across infrastructure and applications.
company_description: SafeNet je švajcarska firma osnovana 2008. godine koja se bavi sajber bezbjednošću i zaštitom podataka za bankarski i zdravstveni sektor.

title: Product Manager
description: Lead product lifecycle from discovery to delivery. Collaborate with engineering and design teams while managing stakeholder expectations.
company_description: Visionary je španska produkt menadžment i inovaciona konsultantska kuća, osnovana 2013. godine, koja pomaže startupima i korporacijama u razvoju digitalnih proizvoda.

title: QA Engineer
description: Design and execute test cases, automate testing frameworks, and ensure product quality through continuous integration pipelines.
company_description: TestLab je američka kompanija osnovana 2011. godine koja pruža QA outsourcing i automatizaciju testiranja za SaaS i gaming industriju.

title: Game Developer (Unity)
description: Develop and optimize gameplay mechanics in Unity. Collaborate with artists and designers to bring engaging experiences to life.
company_description: PlaySphere je švedski game studio osnovan 2015. godine, poznat po razvoju mobilnih i PC igara sa više od 50 miliona preuzimanja globalno.

title: Systems Administrator
description: Manage servers, ensure system uptime, and troubleshoot infrastructure issues. Knowledge of Linux and Windows environments required.
company_description: InfraTech je češka kompanija osnovana 2009. godine, specijalizovana za IT infrastrukturu i cloud hosting rješenja.

title: Cloud Architect
description: Design cloud-native architectures, optimize deployments, and provide guidance on scaling and cost management for enterprise clients.
company_description: NextGenCloud je danska kompanija osnovana 2018. godine koja pruža cloud arhitekturu i konsultantske usluge za enterprise klijente širom Evrope.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Develop and deploy ML models for image and data processing. Collaborate with data scientists and integrate solutions into production systems.
company_description: DeepVision je američka AI kompanija osnovana 2016. godine, specijalizovana za computer vision i duboko učenje u medicini i transportu.

title: IT Support Specialist
description: Provide technical support, troubleshoot issues, and assist employees with hardware and software problems.
company_description: HelpDeskPro je austrijska kompanija osnovana 2012. godine, specijalizovana za IT podršku i outsourcing za mala i srednja preduzeća.

title: Blockchain Developer
description: Develop decentralized applications, smart contracts, and blockchain protocols. Experience with Ethereum and Solidity preferred.
company_description: CryptoForge je estonska firma osnovana 2019. godine, fokusirana na blockchain rješenja, pametne ugovore i Web3 aplikacije.

title: Marketing Specialist (Digital)
description: Plan and execute digital marketing campaigns, manage social media accounts, and analyze performance metrics.
company_description: BrandBoost je marketinška agencija osnovana 2015. godine, koja pruža digitalne marketinške usluge za e-commerce i lifestyle brendove.

title: Business Analyst
description: Gather business requirements, document processes, and collaborate with technical teams to implement solutions.
company_description: StrategyWorks je irska firma osnovana 2010. godine, specijalizovana za poslovnu analitiku, digitalnu transformaciju i strateško planiranje.

title: Technical Writer
description: Write and maintain technical documentation, API references, and user manuals. Collaborate with engineers to ensure accuracy and clarity.
company_description: DocuPro je međunarodna firma osnovana 2014. godine koja se bavi tehničkim pisanjem, dokumentacijom i lokalizacijom softverskih proizvoda.
